ABOUT ME

Get to know me!

I am a Full Stack Web Developer with a primary focus in crafting elegant looking websites and reponsive / mobile friendly designs. I am a graduate of General Assembly's Software Engineering Immersive.

In my free time I enjoy fishing, woodworking, golf, exercising, and playing with my Chihuahua Frankie.
